entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 09:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then east 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Freezing rain along the southern shore. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
